title: Trailblazer harpoon

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Trailblazer harpoon was an item obtained in the Trailblazer League upon unlocking the Infernal Gathering relic. As the relic gives the player the Trailblazer harpoon, as well as the axe and pickaxe, it must be unlocked in a bank.

content:
Trailblazer harpoon was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.
For the cosmetic dragon harpoon skin, see Dragon harpoon (or). For the cosmetic infernal harpoon skin, see Infernal harpoon (or).
Trailblazer harpoon
Released28 October 2020 (Update)
Removal6 January 2021 (Update)

Item ID25114

The Trailblazer harpoon was an item obtained in the Trailblazer League upon unlocking the Infernal Gathering relic. As the relic gives the player the Trailblazer harpoon, as well as the axe and pickaxe, it must be unlocked in a bank.

With no requirement to use and equip, the Trailblazer harpoon functions as a crystal harpoon with similar effects to an infernal harpoon, in which any fish caught are cooked, granting Cooking experience regardless of level requirements. If equipped, it will also work for fish that don't require a harpoon to be caught, e.g. raw trout. In addition, the harpoon also inherits the crystal harpoon's special attack.

The Trailblazer harpoon is destroyed upon death. If players lose the harpoon, they can reclaim it from the Leagues Tutor in Lumbridge.

[[File:Trailblazer harpoon detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''Trailblazer harpoon''' was an item obtained in the [[Trailblazer League]] upon unlocking the [[Infernal Gathering]] relic. As the relic gives the player the Trailblazer harpoon, as well as the [[Trailblazer axe|axe]] and [[Trailblazer pickaxe|pickaxe]], it must be unlocked in a [[bank]].

With no requirement to use and equip, the Trailblazer harpoon functions as a [[crystal harpoon]] with similar effects to an [[infernal harpoon]], in which any fish caught are cooked, granting [[Cooking]] experience regardless of level requirements. If equipped, it will also work for fish that don't require a harpoon to be caught, e.g. [[raw trout]]. In addition, the harpoon also inherits the crystal harpoon's [[special attack]].

The Trailblazer harpoon is destroyed upon [[death]]. If players lose the harpoon, they can reclaim it from the [[Leagues Tutor]] in [[Lumbridge]].
